Wetzel, RuthIda “Ruthie”
74, of Glenview, also of Chicago, Winnetka, Skokie & Eagle River WI, passed away Aug 28 with family by her side after a 6 year battle with Cancer. Ruth worked in Food Service managing lunchrooms at Niles North & New Trier High Schools. She is survived by son Jim Wetzel, son-in-law Lance Lawson, brother Richard Sack (sister-in-law Kathy) & beloved nieces/nephews. She was preceded in death by husband Richard "Dick" Wetzel and parents Herman & Mathilde Sack. A Memorial Reception will be held in her honor The Women's Athletic Club of Chicago Wed Sept 7, 5-8 pm. A life long supporter of PBS - in lieu of flowers donations can me made to WTTW Chicago.
Woelfel, Laverne
Laverne Woelfel, 82, of Wallingford, formerly of Chicago, died peacefully Wednesday, July 27, 2016. She was the wife of the late Donald Woelfel.
Relatives and friends are invited to attend a graveside service in St. Benedict Cemetery, 4600 W. 135th St. Crestwood on Saturday, September 3, 2016 at 11:00 a.m. For a complete obituary, please visit www.wallingfordfh.com ... ... ...
